column1: look_left/ I look to the left
look_right/ I look to the right
look_uleft/ I look up to the left
look_uright/ I look up to the right
point_left/ I look and point to the left
point_right/ I look and point to the right
point_uleft/ I look and point up to the left
point_uright/ I look and point up to the right
salute/ I say hello with my hand
explanation/ I explain to you rising my hands
thinking/ I think and touch my face
anger/ I get angry at you and I get red
